title: Tasty Chicken Burger Recipe
content:
The delicious and juicy chicken burger which is not only tasty but is super easy to make. This burger makes a great lunch or dinner.

The super delicious spicy burger which is perfect to pack in a lunch box or taste amazing for dinner too.

 

Chicken Burger Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 10 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 burger

 

Ingredients

Minced Chicken - 500 grams

Olive oil - 1 tablespoon + more for frying

Onion - 1 small chopped finely

Capsicum / Bell Pepper - ¼ cup chopped finely

Garlic - 3 chopped finely

Green Chillies - 1 chopped finely

Egg - 1

Breadcrumbs - ½ cup

Salt to taste

Black Pepper to taste

Coriander Leaves - ½ cup chopped finely

Mayonnaise as needed

Tomato Ketchup as needed

Onions - 1 sliced

Tomato - 1 sliced

Burger Buns as needed

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan, add onions, capsicum, chilies, garlic and saute for a min.

Take chicken in a bowl, add all ingredients except oil and mix well.

Shape it into a ball and flatten it into patties.

Heat oil in a pan, add in patties and cook for 3 to 4 mins on each side.

Take burger buns, split open, spread mayo and ketchup.

Place patties and top with sliced onions and tomatoes.

Serve it.

Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
